scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains oversized letters written to John Wesley Hunt from his business partner, Harry Heth; his father, Abraham Hunt of Trenton, Pennsylvania; and his brothers, Wilson and Pearson Hunt of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, regarding his new business ventures in Richmond, Virginia. Copies of these letters are stored in Box 1, Folder 2 along with other materials from 1792.
